name: Greymane and the Greater
status: Dormant (Memory until Battle of Whiterun Countdown 6/8)
description: You overheard Vignar’s intent before the war fully moved. When the Stormcloaks begin their march, that knowledge becomes leverage: warn Balgruuf, or aid Vignar’s bid to shape Whiterun’s future.

objectives.description: When the march is announced, decide whether to warn Balgruuf or approach Vignar
If warning Balgruuf: deliver the intel discreetly (avoid Thalmor ears)
If conspiring with Vignar: discuss terms, risks, and what he expects of you

rewards: Potential faction trust shifts (Stormcloaks / Imperials / Whiterun Guard posture)
notes: This quest is unlocked only by Success with Style on the Vignar overhear scene in Phase 2.
